Shinji Kagawa from BVB and Gladbach's Patrick Herrmann before changing to VfB Stuttgart?

Stuttgart in search of reinforcements

Kagawa and Herrmann a topic at VfB?

Patrick Herrmann of Borussia Mönchengladbach and Shinji Kagawa of Borussia Dortmund are allegedly among the candidates for a winter transfer to VfB Stuttgart.

In addition, the club had been offered to information from "Stuttgarter Nachrichten" / "Stuttgarter Zeitung" and the Gladbach striker Josip DrmiÄ‡.
At Herrmann, the Swabians, who are looking for reinforcements for the second half of the competition but also: The FC Augsburg and FC Southampton with team manager Ralph Hasenhüttl should be interested.
Stuttgart sports director Michael Reschke had announced after the 1: 3 on the last day of the first round to want to commit up to three entrances for the second half.


Immediately thereafter agreed to relegation threatened VfB with Hertha BSC on a transfer on loan initially until the end of the season for attacker Alexander Esswein.
